ja479:8.3: Pathaviyā nābhiyaṃ → puthuviyā ayaṃ (bj) | paṭhaviyā ayaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | puthaviyā'yaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja479:8.4: sutaṃ mante mahārāja → sutaṃ mahārāja (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja479:11.1: Abhijāto nāgo → abhijāto te nāgo (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja479:12.4: yathimassidaṃ → yathā idaṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja479:17.1: Taṃ → taṃ vacanaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed), kāliṅgaṃ → kāliṅgo (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed) | kaliṅga (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja479:19.1: Mahayitvā sambodhiṃ → mahāyitvāna sambodhiṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | pahaṃsitvāna sambodhiṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | mamāyitvāna taṃ bodhiṃ (mr)
ja479:19.4: Atha rājā manupāyāsi →  pākāraparikkhepaṃ kāresi (sī1) | pākāraparikkhepaṃ kāresi. atha rājā pāyāsi (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
